channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Waiting On First Submissions
item.description:
It’s been a long time coming. I’ve been writing forever, but never bothered to submit anything anywhere. I’m not sure what changed, but something snapped and now I’m all in.

I’m currently waiting on five submissions. I’ll post here after decisions are made and I have something to share.

It’s a strange feeling that I don’t really care if these pieces are rejected or not, the one thing I learned in academia was that it’s rarely the case that something shouldn’t be published, it’s really just a question of fit. So I am focusing on trying to find the right home for these pieces while at the same time consistently producing more.
